headline: Mastercard & PayTabs Launch Payment Platform to Aid Egyptian SMEs
summary: MA partners with PayTabs to unveil a white-labeled digital payments platform to improve payment experiences for SMEs in Egypt, thereby bolstering MA's nationwide presence.

headline: 2 Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy in the Stock Market Sell-Off
summary: Equity markets are struggling due to President Donald Trump's decision to impose tariffs on imported goods from every country.  What stocks does Buffett own that are worth holding onto through market volatility and beyond?  Let's consider two prime candidates: Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) and Mastercard (NYSE: MA).
